Article.ArticleTitle: Breaking through the noise: how to unveil the cognitive impact of long COVID on pre-existing conditions with executive dysfunctions?

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Centre de médecine de précision, Centre hospitalier universitaire Georges-L.-Dumont, Réseau de santé Vitalité, Moncton, NB, Canada.
